content: this pattern is written in short hand so basic notes as it has a corresponding tutorial on you tube https //youtu be/4eywadq-mrw to clarify the notes no gauge is needed as it is a loose fitting shawl and this project should only take a weekend to finish hence the name the weekend shawl you could do different variations with the same stitch count used by not doing back loop double_crochet you can choose to do normal double_crochet in the row required or even alternate the back loop only row with normal double_crochet for a staggered texture of lines please enjoy
